channel.title: 07League - #1 2007 RS Remake - UPDATED TODAY 10/21
channel.description:
[center][b]Welcome to the official development thread of 07League, a complete remake of RuneScape in 2007.[/b]
[B]THE CLIENT HAS NOT BEEN WORKED ON AT ALL, PLEASE DO NOT POST ANYTHING ABOUT THE WRONG GAMEFRAME, ITEMS, ETC...[/B] Features: (I cant remember ALL the updates i did, so im just listing the ones off the top of my head) [/center]
[B]Skills:[/B]
Mining Woodcutting Fishing Firemaking Cooking Agility Slayer [COLOR=orange]Herblore Runecrafting Farming (already in, may rewrite)[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Theiving (already in, WILL rewrite)[/COLOR]
[B]Combat:[/B]
[COLOR=Lime]Your defense level actually affects what your opponent hits[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Perfect Combat Formula[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]Added all foods and potions from scratch[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]Explosive Pots[/COLOR]
[B]Major Cities:[/B] [COLOR=Lime]Varrock Draynor Lumbridge[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Camelot Ardougne Falador[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Catherby Seer's Village West Ardougne [/COLOR]
[B]Quests[/B]
[COLOR=Lime]Cook's Assistant Doric's Quest Rune Mysteries Horror From the Deep Druidic Ritual Imp Catcher Tree Gnome Village[/COLOR]
[B]Stabilization/Behind the Scenes[/B]
[COLOR=Lime]Writing to a text file[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]Core work to max the server at LEAST 10x less laggy[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Cleaned up process[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Modify the player save[/COLOR]
[B]Bug Fixes[/B]
[COLOR=Lime]Had some issues with the server, when I fixed a bunch of bugs I also created a couple (which have all been fixed) All known dupes fixed All known bugs fixed[/COLOR]
[B]Other:[/B]
[COLOR=Lime] Bucket filling from well Dummies Double doors Single doors Over 200 NPCS manually added to ensure correct spots, I may have ocd... Run Energy Website is done, EXCEPT for accounts and forums[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Don't have any other stuff planned for now[/COLOR]
No client work has been done, therefore it has the 317 gameframe Media: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TQv3r.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0AiGW.png[/img] I MAY CHANGE THE GAMEFRAME TO 459, WILL HOLD A POLL!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uXCqcHGKuTk&feature=plcp
Stability test! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WeUt5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WNL6J.png[/img]

item.title: 07League - #1 2007 RS Remake - UPDATED TODAY 10/21
item.dc:creator: @CodeBest CodeBest
item.description:
@CodeBest wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:24, topic:446900”]“The Officer performs a cursory search on you”

I think what you mean is, “The Officer performs a Customs search on you”, or “The Customs Officer searches you”.[/quote]

No I meant cursory, cursory means quick and not paying attention to detail. But I think what you posted is actually the correct dialogue.

@heart,
No, where did I point out I had a problem with you using an IDE? lol java developer program? …

Read full topic

item.title: 07League - #1 2007 RS Remake - UPDATED TODAY 10/21
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“CodeBest, post:21, topic:446900”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=549780.msg4053683#msg4053683 date=1342744808]

Stop with the god damn remakes -____-

Now why would I do that? I can make whatever type of server I want, and I choose to make a remake.

Why a 2006 remake? Why can’t you do something creative, like a rs2 beta remake, or 2008 remake? why does everyone have to do either 06 or an 07 remake?

Because the best era in most peoples opinions, is 06-07.

You don’t need to make a remake, you could make a highly edited RSPS.

Of course I don’t need to, but I choose to. Why don’t you make a highly edited server? Because there are no good ones atm, all of them are PI leeches. Go build one off hyperion.

I’m currently using eclipse to clip firemaking for a certain shard based server thank you very much.
[/quote]

Wow eclipse, what a badass[/quote]
You have a problem with me using a java developer Program LOL? Does it offend you?

Read full topic
